title: New type of mobile tracking link shoppers' physical movements, buying choices

title_detail.value: New type of mobile tracking link shoppers' physical movements, buying choices

summary: A new study used a targeting strategy that tracks where, when, and for how long consumers are in a shopping mall to determine how shoppers' physical movements affect their economic choices. The study found that targeting potential customers in this way can significantly improve advertising via mobile phones.
